game.name: ISLAND
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Sanzenkai Setsuna awakens on the shore of isolated island Urashima with no memories of his past. Befriending three local girls, Rinne, Karen, and Sara, Setsuna's quest to discover the secrets of Urashima and how they tie into his own past - and future - begins.
